sourcesContent:
<template>
  <Line :data="data" :options="options" />
</template>
<script>
import {
Chart as ChartJS,
Title,
Tooltip,
Legend,
BarElement,
CategoryScale,
LinearScale
} from 'chart.js'
import { Line } from 'vue-chartjs'

export default {
  name:'SplineChart',
  components: {
    Line
},
data() {
  return {
    data: {
      labels: ['January', 'February', 'March'],
      datasets: [{ data: [40, 20, 12] }]
    },
    options: {
      responsive: true
    }
  }
}
}
</script>
